did.head: DESCRIPTIVE SUMMARY
did.unittitle: National Extension Association of Family and Consumer Sciences (U.S.) records, 1933-2009.

origination.label: Creator:

did.repository: Division of Rare and Manuscript Collections, Cornell University Library
did.abstract: Includes minutes of meetings and programs from annual conferences.

bioghist.head: ORGANIZATIONAL HISTORY
bioghist.p: The National Extension Association of Family and Consumer Sciences educates and recognizes extension professionals who improve the quality of life for individuals, families, and communities and provide education in food preparation, safety and nutrition, financial management, healthy lifestyles, home and work environment and safety, relationship and parenting skills.
Formerly the National Association of Extension Home Economists (NAEHE)

scopecontent.head: COLLECTION DESCRIPTION
scopecontent.p: Includes minutes of meetings and programs from annual conferences.
